channel.title: Goals
channel.description:
My goals are simple because I cbf to put in 12 hours a day like I use to.
My long term goal is 70 in all skills. All f2p quests completed. Most p2p quests completed.
and that's about it. I don't want any 99s, just a well balanced account that I can enjoy.
What are your goals?

item.title: Goals
item.dc:creator: @Rodgerwilco Rodgerwilco
item.description:
@Rodgerwilco wrote:

[quote=“Flame_, post:11, topic:499860”][quote author=Rodgerwilco link=topic=618087.msg4245943#msg4245943 date=1362089490]
Well the only 99 I want is farming
[/quote]
With the amount of time that you would need to invest in order to get that 99, be happy that skill is the only one you want to max. :P[/quote]

tree seeds bro… tree seeds. 3 months if I had an income… right now yew seeds are 5k each

once I finish some quests and get magic up I can teleport to all of the locations = 30 minutes of gameplay every 8 hours.

Read full topic

item.title: Goals
item.dc:creator: @Nothing1 -Nothing
item.description:
@Nothing1 wrote:

Do quests Desert Treasure and Monkey Madness,
Then get 60 attack, 80+ strength, 80+ magic. and some money.

That’s pretty much my goals atm.

Read full topic

item.title: Goals
item.dc:creator: @eyeownyew Eyeownyew
item.description:
@eyeownyew wrote:

Quest cape within three months

Read full topic

item.title: Goals
item.dc:creator: @Flame3 John
item.description:
@Flame3 wrote:

Wouldn’t 57 agility come in at around 2-3 weeks of playing time, assuming you play for nearly 1-2 hours a day?

Read full topic

item.title: Goals
item.dc:creator: @Elrick Elrick
item.description:
@Elrick wrote:

[quote=“Tutorial, post:5, topic:499860”][quote author=Elrick link=topic=618087.msg4245779#msg4245779 date=1362085799]
Short term:
All F2P quests done
35 Agility

Long term:
All possible quests I can do with my levels.
57 Agility
[/quote]
Why only 57 agility for a long term goal?[/quote]
I don’t like making big goals. If I look at my goals and can’t see myself coming close to it then I lose motivation.

Read full topic

item.title: Goals
item.dc:creator: @Flame3 John
item.description:
@Flame3 wrote:

I was never big on being a part of that growing competition, nor do I plan to try to catch up.
I do my own thing most of the time, be it skilling with some friends or eventually bossing with my clan mates.
Skill-wise, I am hoping for 99 woodcutting and fletching in the long run, and a balanced amount of level 70 in attack, defense and strength.
I’m probably going to be poor as hell in the long run.

Read full topic

item.title: Goals
item.dc:creator: @Tutorial Tutorial
item.description:
@Tutorial wrote:

I’m sure you will end up getting a few 99s. For me, I just really want to let the community cool down a bit before I start playing seriously. I don’t like any hype on games, especially when that hype is due to everyone grinding ridiculous hours just in a rush to get a 99 before other players. I’m sure I’ll have more goals when you can actually mine or woodcut without sharing a rock with someone else.

Read full topic
